department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Introduction of amendment to existing contract regarding Eddy Current System
description: Eddy Current testing is a non-destructive testing (NDT) inspection method that uses electromagnetism to detect surface and sub-surface flaws in conductive materials.
full_summary:
[Tender Announcement]
====================================================================

**Title (English)**: W0046-240002 Eddy Current System
**Title (French)**: W0046-240002 Système de contrôle par courants de Foucault

**Notice Type (English)**: Request for Proposal
**Notice Type (French)**: Demande de propositions

**Procurement Number (English)**: WS4169269918
**Procurement Number (French)**: WS4169269918

**Description (English)**: The Department of National Defence (DND), Royal Military College of Canada (RMC), requires the supply, delivery, and training of an Eddy Current System. This system is used for non-destructive testing (NDT) inspections, detecting surface and sub-surface flaws in conductive materials.

**Description (French)**: Le ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN), Collège militaire royal du Canada (CMR), souhaite combler un besoin relativement à l’approvisionnement, à la livraison et à la formation d’un système d’essais par courants de Foucault. Utilisé pour des inspections de contrôle par les essais non destructifs (END), ce système permet de détecter les défauts en surface et sous les surfaces des matériaux conducteurs.

**Submission Details**: Submissions must be received by October 3, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. Any submission received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
Contact: Mike Littlefield (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17364148?extsite=MTczNjQxNDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tendering Method**: Competitive – Open bidding

Note: I have formatted the output to be a bit more readable in a markdown format, and I have also rearranged the information to be a bit more logical and consistent. I have also kept the original information without adding too much
